name: linkedin-clone
description: LinkedIn clone - Full-stack social networking application

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & cd ../frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul & cd ..
